title: Ok Riot, stop throwing me against plat players.
body:
Alright going from S1 to G5 is hard enough how it is, already on a pretty big losing streak and they decide to throw me against plat players?, thats just bullshit I keep dropping to S2 because everytime I get back near S1 im tossed against a team of plats (Also because of my own fuckups I drop)

Any explanation?

replies.body:
umm maybe play at more active times? I don't know, that shouldn't really be happening unless you've just recently had a massive spike in climbing elo. But the matchmaking is more balanced at more active times generally... That's too bad but if it's intentional it's because they think you deserve high gold so that's kinda nice compliment but also horrible since the season is almost over and you need gold for the loot don't you?

Anyways goodluck, maybe someone at rito might notice something wrong, and in the meantime I believe in you puncake, I believe you can win and climb. I'm sure you can do it even though I've never met you before. You can do it. Believe in yourself.
Amen, I got to gold just last night, thanks for having faith in me man. I'm sure it helped me get there!
Your MMR is really up there then.
